alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:47PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Scattered showers and thunderstorms this evening... Scattered rain showers and thunderstorms will remain possible through this evening across Pueblo and El Paso Counties. While severe weather is not expected at this time, gusty winds up to 50 mph will be possible. Gusty winds may still be possible even if precipitation is not reaching the ground. Secure loose outdoor objects.
